name: Cartuchito World: Canella Edition
storyline: Mr. Wilson got the three powerful golden cartridges, but he found out about the Cartuchito (an even more special cartridge) and wants it too. The problem is that Cartuchito is in the hands of the Evil King, who also kidnapped Mr. Wilson and Canella's friend, Ronaldo.
summary:
Cartuchito World is a Super Mario World rom hack based on a web show called Cartuchito.

The Canella Edition is a later edition of the rom hack that replaces the character Ronaldo with Canella (putting Ronaldo in place of the character, Guitarrinha) and follows the cast replacement that took place on the YouTube channel.
